videoSnippet.title: They Called Him "The Hand"
videoSnippet.description:
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

Photos by Lenart Ootes
Have a great day :)

K Gerasimov vs Vasily Smyslov
Moscow Pioneer Home championsip (1935), Moscow URS, Nov-??
Rubinstein Opening (D05)

1. d4 d5 2. Nf3 Nf6 3. e3 e6 4. Bd3 c5 5. b3 Nc6 6. Bb2 Bd6 7. O-O Qc7 8. a3 b6 9. c4 Bb7 10. Nc3 a6 11. Re1 cd4 12. ed4 O-O 13. Na4 Bf4 14. Ne5 dc4 15. bc4 Ne5 16. de5 Qc6 17. Bf1 Rfd8 18. Qb3 Ng4 19. h3 Rd3 20. Qb6 Rh3 21. Bd4 Bh2 22. Kh1 Be5

00:00 Hello Everyone!
01:25  Game Starts!
02:45 Completely New Game!
05:40  Pause the Video!
07:37 It was in this position!
09:15 Contributions!
